labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Userlist shows username with one space in between, while the ping shows all of the spaces.
data.expected_result: Userlist and ping show the same username
data.short_description: Putting more than one space in between two letters in your username causes the userlist to display only one space, but pings show all of them
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your username to something like "1             2 Ben Z." - Look at the user list - Have someone ping you
